testcase.name: Auth Store > initial state > should have correct initial state
Auth Store > login > should login successfully with valid credentials
Auth Store > login > should handle login failure
Auth Store > login > should set loading state during login
Auth Store > logout > should clear user state on logout
Auth Store > token refresh > should refresh tokens successfully
Auth Store > token refresh > should logout if refresh token is expired
Auth Store > token refresh > should logout if refresh fails
Auth Store > initialize > should initialize with valid stored tokens
Auth Store > initialize > should refresh tokens if access token expired but refresh token valid
Auth Store > initialize > should logout if both tokens are expired
Auth Store > initialize > should handle initialization errors gracefully
Auth Store > error handling > should clear errors when clearError is called
Auth Store > error handling > should set loading state correctly
Auth Store > persistence > should persist authentication state
useAuth Hook > role hierarchy > should correctly implement role hierarchy
useAuth Hook > permission system > SUPER_ADMIN permissions > should have all permissions
useAuth Hook > permission system > ADMIN permissions > should have correct permissions for ADMIN
useAuth Hook > permission system > MANAGER permissions > should have correct permissions for MANAGER
useAuth Hook > permission system > ACCOUNTANT permissions > should have correct permissions for ACCOUNTANT
useAuth Hook > permission system > EMPLOYEE permissions > should have correct permissions for EMPLOYEE
useAuth Hook > permission system > VIEWER permissions > should have correct permissions for VIEWER
useAuth Hook > canAccess helper > should correctly check resource access
useAuth Hook > canAccess helper > should default to read access
useAuth Hook > unauthenticated state > should return false for all permissions when not authenticated
useAuth Hook > integration with auth store > should reflect auth store state changes
useAuth Hook > integration with auth store > should provide all auth store actions
useAuth Hook > financial role scenarios > should handle accountant-specific permissions correctly
useAuth Hook > financial role scenarios > should restrict sensitive operations appropriately
